Hierarchy For Package org.apache.logging.log4j.io

Class Hierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.ByteStreamLogger
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.CharStreamLogger
    • java.io.InputStream (implements java.io.Closeable)
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.io.BufferedInputStream
          • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerBufferedInputStream
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerInputStream
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.IoBuilder
    • java.io.OutputStream (implements java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable)
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerFilterOutputStream
        • java.io.PrintStream (implements java.lang.Appendable, java.io.Closeable)
          • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerPrintStream
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerOutputStream
    • java.io.Reader (implements java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Readable)
      • java.io.BufferedReader
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerBufferedReader
      • java.io.FilterReader
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerReader
    • java.io.Writer (implements java.lang.Appendable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable)
      • java.io.FilterWriter
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerFilterWriter
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerWriter
      • java.io.PrintWriter
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.io.LoggerPrintWriter
